Void request is allowed only for payments in SETTLED status performed on the same financial day.

Must be SHA1 of MD5 encoded string (uppercased): payment_id + merchant_pass\n","example":"A1B2C3D4E5F67890123456789ABCDEF123456789"}},"title":"VoidRequest"},"example":{"merchant_key":"xxxxx-xxxxx-xxxxx","payment_id":"63c781cc-de3d-11eb-a1f1-0242ac130006","hash":"{{operation_hash}}"}}}}}
